speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: ACT III

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: SCENE I. Before PROSPERO'S Cell.

speaker: STEPHANO
text_entry: Enter FERDINAND, bearing a log

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: There be some sports are painful, and their labour

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Delight in them sets off: some kinds of baseness

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Are nobly undergone and most poor matters

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Point to rich ends. This my mean task

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Would be as heavy to me as odious, but

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: The mistress which I serve quickens what's dead

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: And makes my labours pleasures: O, she is

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Ten times more gentle than her father's crabbed,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: And he's composed of harshness. I must remove

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Some thousands of these logs and pile them up,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Upon a sore injunction: my sweet mistress

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Weeps when she sees me work, and says, such baseness

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Had never like executor. I forget:

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: But these sweet thoughts do even refresh my labours,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Most busy lest, when I do it.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Enter MIRANDA; and PROSPERO at a distance, unseen

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Alas, now, pray you,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Work not so hard: I would the lightning had

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Burnt up those logs that you are enjoin'd to pile!

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Pray, set it down and rest you: when this burns,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: 'Twill weep for having wearied you. My father

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Is hard at study; pray now, rest yourself;

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: He's safe for these three hours.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: O most dear mistress,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: The sun will set before I shall discharge

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: What I must strive to do.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: If you'll sit down,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I'll bear your logs the while: pray, give me that;

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I'll carry it to the pile.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: No, precious creature;

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I had rather crack my sinews, break my back,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Than you should such dishonour undergo,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: While I sit lazy by.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: It would become me

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: As well as it does you: and I should do it

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: With much more ease; for my good will is to it,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: And yours it is against.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Poor worm, thou art infected!

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: This visitation shows it.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: You look wearily.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: No, noble mistress;'tis fresh morning with me

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: When you are by at night. I do beseech you--

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Chiefly that I might set it in my prayers--

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: What is your name?

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Miranda.--O my father,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I have broke your hest to say so!

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Admired Miranda!

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Indeed the top of admiration! worth

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: What's dearest to the world! Full many a lady

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I have eyed with best regard and many a time

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: The harmony of their tongues hath into bondage

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Brought my too diligent ear: for several virtues

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Have I liked several women; never any

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: With so fun soul, but some defect in her

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Did quarrel with the noblest grace she owed

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: And put it to the foil: but you, O you,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: So perfect and so peerless, are created

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Of every creature's best!

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I do not know

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: One of my sex; no woman's face remember,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Save, from my glass, mine own; nor have I seen

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: More that I may call men than you, good friend,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: And my dear father: how features are abroad,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I am skilless of; but, by my modesty,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: The jewel in my dower, I would not wish

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Any companion in the world but you,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Nor can imagination form a shape,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Besides yourself, to like of. But I prattle

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Something too wildly and my father's precepts

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I therein do forget.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I am in my condition

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: A prince, Miranda; I do think, a king;

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: I would, not so!--and would no more endure

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: This wooden slavery than to suffer

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: The flesh-fly blow my mouth. Hear my soul speak:

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: The very instant that I saw you, did

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: My heart fly to your service; there resides,

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: To make me slave to it; and for your sake

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Am I this patient log--man.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Do you love me?

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: O heaven, O earth, bear witness to this sound

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: And crown what I profess with kind event

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: If I speak true! if hollowly, invert

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: What best is boded me to mischief! I

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Beyond all limit of what else i' the world

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Do love, prize, honour you.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I am a fool

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: To weep at what I am glad of.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Fair encounter

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Of two most rare affections! Heavens rain grace

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: On that which breeds between 'em!

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Wherefore weep you?

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: At mine unworthiness that dare not offer

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: What I desire to give, and much less take

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: What I shall die to want. But this is trifling;

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: And all the more it seeks to hide itself,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: The bigger bulk it shows. Hence, bashful cunning!

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: And prompt me, plain and holy innocence!

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: I am your wife, if you will marry me;

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: If not, I'll die your maid: to be your fellow

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: You may deny me; but I'll be your servant,

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Whether you will or no.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: My mistress, dearest;

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: And I thus humble ever.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: My husband, then?

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Ay, with a heart as willing

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: As bondage e'er of freedom: here's my hand.

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: And mine, with my heart in't; and now farewell

speaker: MIRANDA
text_entry: Till half an hour hence.

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: A thousand thousand!

speaker: FERDINAND
text_entry: Exeunt FERDINAND and MIRANDA severally

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: So glad of this as they I cannot be,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Who are surprised withal; but my rejoicing

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: At nothing can be more. I'll to my book,

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: For yet ere supper-time must I perform

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Much business appertaining.

speaker: PROSPERO
text_entry: Exit
